USAGE_BAD_TEXT: You must type the name or ID of the item you want to use.
ITEM_NOT_FOUND_TEXT: I couldn't find that item. Use `{{prefix}}bag` to see your inventory or `{{prefix}}shop list` to see IDs.
NO_PETS_TEXT_SHORT: You don't have pets yet. Incubate an egg to get one.
OCARINA_ALREADY_WITH_YOU: Your pet is already with you. You don't need to use this right now.
OCARINA_NOT_OWNED: You don't have this item in your bag.
INCUBATOR_NOT_OWNED: You don't have an incubator in your bag.
